channel.title: Game Ripping
channel.description:
ok lets start, a rip is a game that is compressed with cutting movies, music, intro's
NOTE: to delete intro's, music, movies, just go to the main game folder and delete that shit, when the game doens't works anymore make a avi, bink, or other file thats only one second.
Another NOTE: to make a rip you need a bit knowledge, this is verry hard for newbies
1.
download UHARC GUI v2.0 @
http://rapidshare.de/files/10758585/UHARCGUI2.0-xp.rar
2. install uharc, start uharc
3. fill in the needed details, always check "Include Subdirectories", always choose the best compression method, this may take a while but the compression owns
4. when its finished you have a .uha file you cant do somthing with it?? yes you can do somthing with it lets script
5. open notepad, write a script like this:
@echo off cls UHARC.exe x -o+ -vm+ -y+ files.uha cls del files.uha echo DONE... pause
wtf are these commands?
@echo off = the headline of evrey .bat file
cls = clearscreen
UHARC.exe x -o+ -vm+ -y+ files.uha = dont touch this, only change the files.uha line
del files.uha = the file "files.uha" will be deleted after unpacking to save hd space
echo = a line where you can typ somthing
echo. = this is a open line with no text
pause = this will pause the .bat, you have to press enter to continue
6. now lets make a outro
a outro will look like smilear like this
echo ************************************************ echo * :::===== :::==== :::==== :::===== ::: === * echo * ::: ::: === ::: === ::: ::: === * echo * === ======= ======== === ====== * echo * === === === === === === === === * echo * ======= === === === === ======= === === * echo ************************************************ echo ************************************************ echo * Enjoy another fine rip of: fix * echo ************************************************ echo. echo. pause
change that to your name at
http://www.network-science.de/ascii/
, it will look horrible in windows but when you save it as a .bat file and open it its nice
7. you get now somthing like:
@echo off cls UHARC.exe x -o+ -vm+ -y+ files.uha cls del files.uha echo DONE... pause echo ************************************************ echo * :::===== :::==== :::==== :::===== ::: === * echo * ::: ::: === ::: === ::: ::: === * echo * === ======= ======== === ====== * echo * === === === === === === === === * echo * ======= === === === === ======= === === * echo ************************************************ echo ************************************************ echo * Enjoy another fine rip of: Gaurav * echo ************************************************ echo. echo. pause
now save this as install.bat and put all files so " files.uha & install.bat " in a folder and share it to whereisit !!
have fun with this tutorial
some files you need !
http://rapidshare.de/files/10758654/UHARC.rar ~jonckr~

item.title: Game Ripping
item.dc:creator: @jonckr jonckr
item.description:
@jonckr wrote:

ok lets start, a rip is a game that is compressed with cutting movies, music, intro’s

NOTE: to delete intro’s, music, movies, just go to the main game folder and delete that shit, when the game doens’t works anymore make a avi, bink, or other file thats only one second.

Another NOTE: to make a rip you need a bit knowledge, this is verry hard for newbies

download UHARC GUI v2.0 @

http://rapidshare.de/files/10758585/UHARCGUI2.0-xp.rar

  1. install uharc, start uharc

  2. fill in the needed details, always check “Include Subdirectories”, always choose the best compression method, this may take a while but the compression owns

  3. when its finished you have a .uha file you cant do somthing with it?? yes you can do somthing with it lets script

  4. open notepad, write a script like this:

@echo off
cls
UHARC.exe x -o+ -vm+ -y+ files.uha
cls
del files.uha
echo DONE…
pause

wtf are these commands?

@echo off = the headline of evrey .bat file

cls = clearscreen

UHARC.exe x -o+ -vm+ -y+ files.uha = dont touch this, only change the files.uha line

del files.uha = the file “files.uha” will be deleted after unpacking to save hd space

echo = a line where you can typ somthing

echo. = this is a open line with no text

pause = this will pause the .bat, you have to press enter to continue

  1. now lets make a outro

a outro will look like smilear like this

echo ************************************************
echo * :::===== :::==== :::==== :::===== ::: === *
echo * ::: ::: === ::: === ::: ::: === *
echo * === ======= ======== === ====== *
echo * === === === === === === === === *
echo * ======= === === === === ======= === === *
echo ************************************************
echo ************************************************
echo * Enjoy another fine rip of: fix *
echo ************************************************
echo.
echo.
pause

change that to your name at

http://www.network-science.de/ascii/

, it will look horrible in windows but when you save it as a .bat file and open it its nice

  1. you get now somthing like:

@echo off
cls
UHARC.exe x -o+ -vm+ -y+ files.uha
cls
del files.uha
echo DONE…
pause
echo ************************************************
echo * :::===== :::==== :::==== :::===== ::: === *
echo * ::: ::: === ::: === ::: ::: === *
echo * === ======= ======== === ====== *
echo * === === === === === === === === *
echo * ======= === === === === ======= === === *
echo ************************************************
echo ************************************************
echo * Enjoy another fine rip of: Gaurav *
echo ************************************************
echo.
echo.
pause

now save this as install.bat
and put all files so " files.uha & install.bat " in a folder and share it to whereisit !!

have fun with this tutorial

some files you need !

http://rapidshare.de/files/10758654/UHARC.rar
~jonckr~
